Como la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]oro[COLOR_REVERT] no puede convertirse en algo más, se puede vender de inmediato a un buen precio. Asignar a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Minero de oro experto[COLOR_REVERT] a este puesto generará un montón del preciado metal.

TEXT.English: Pearls Hunters ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable pearls. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with pearls will automatically make them a Pearls Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Pearls Hunters ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable pearls. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with pearls will automatically make them a Pearls Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Perlensucher suchen entlang der Küste nach Perlen. Wird ein Kolonist der Arbeit auf einem Feld mit Perlen zugewiesen, wird er dadurch automaisch ein Perlensucher. Nutzen Sie wenn möglich den Erfahrene Perlensucher.
TEXT.Italian: Pearls Hunters ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable pearls. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with pearls will automatically make them a Pearls Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Pearls Hunters ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable pearls. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with pearls will automatically make them a Pearls Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the sea. Any ocean or coast tile they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the sea. Any ocean or coast tile they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Perlensucher[COLOR_REVERT] sind Meister der Küste und des Ozeans. Sie können dort beträchtliche Mengen an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Perlen[COLOR_REVERT] gewinnen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the sea. Any ocean or coast tile they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the sea. Any ocean or coast tile they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Grasslands tiles can yield [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT] if the colonist working them is assigned to the Coffee Planter profession. Your harvests of Coffee can be significantly increased by assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Coffee Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to the job.
TEXT.French: Les prairies peuvent toutes produire du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si le colon qui les exploite est assigné à la profession de Planteur de Café. Vos récoltes de Café peuvent être considérablement augmentées en assignant un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteur de Café professionnel[COLOR_REVERT] à cette fonction.
TEXT.German: Kakaotrockner trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kakaofrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] zu Kakaobohnen. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kako- u. Kaffeehändler:Kako- u. Kaffeehändler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Le praterie possono ospitare piantagioni di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT], se assegno il lavoro di coltivatore di Caffè ai coloni che lavorano in quelle caselle. Puoi aumentare ulteriormente la produzione di Caffè assegnando lo stesso lavoro a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di Caffè [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las casillas de pradera pueden dar [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si asignáis al Colono que trabaja ahí la profesión de Plantador de Café. La cosecha aumentará sustancialmente si ponéis a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de Café experto[COLOR_REVERT] en el puesto.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Coffee Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteurs de Café professionnels[COLOR_REVERT] doublent la production de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] dans la case où ils travaillent.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Kaffeepflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppeln den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrücht[COLOR_REVERT]ertrag jedes Geländefelds, auf dem sie arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatori esperti di Caffè[COLOR_REVERT] Raddoppiano infatti la quantità di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT] prodotta dalla casella in cui lavorano.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantadores de Café expertos[COLOR_REVERT] produce el doble de cantidad de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] en cualquier casilla en la que trabaje.

TEXT.English: Grasslands tiles can yield [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT] if the colonist working them is assigned to the Coffee Planter profession. Your harvests of Coffee can be significantly increased by assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Coffee Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to the job.
TEXT.French: Les prairies peuvent toutes produire du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si le colon qui les exploite est assigné à la profession de Planteur de Café. Vos récoltes de Café peuvent être considérablement augmentées en assignant un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteur de Café professionnel[COLOR_REVERT] à cette fonction.
TEXT.German: Savanne-Geländefelder können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Kaffeepflanzerberuf zugewiesen wurde. Ihre Kaffeeernte kann erheblich gesteigert werden, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Kaffeepflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Le praterie possono ospitare piantagioni di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT], se assegno il lavoro di coltivatore di Caffè ai coloni che lavorano in quelle caselle. Puoi aumentare ulteriormente la produzione di Caffè assegnando lo stesso lavoro a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di Caffè [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las casillas de pradera pueden dar [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si asignáis al Colono que trabaja ahí la profesión de Plantador de Café. La cosecha aumentará sustancialmente si ponéis a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de Café experto[COLOR_REVERT] en el puesto.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Fermentators[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Fermentators[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kako- u. Kaffeehändler:Kako- u. Kaffeehändler[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kakaorüchte[COLOR_REVERT] in getrockneten Kaffee bzw. Kakao, wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Fermentators[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Fermentators[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa beans[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Driers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Driers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Kaffeetrockner trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] zu Rohkaffee. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kaffeetrockner[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Driers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Driers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee beans[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] sind im Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] viel effektiver als andere Kolonisten. Dieser Beruf ist auf bestimmten Bonus-Ressourcen besonders profitabel, wie z.B. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Büffel[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hirschen[COLOR_REVERT] ausgeübt werden und erzeugt sowohl [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Felle[COLOR_REVERT], wie auch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the coast and the sea. Any tile with bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seals[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walruss[COLOR_REVERT] they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the coast and the sea. Any tile with bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seals[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walruss[COLOR_REVERT] they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Seelöwenjäger[COLOR_REVERT] sind Meister der Küste und des Ozeans. Sie können auf den Bonusressourcen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seelöwen[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walrösser[COLOR_REVERT] beträchtliche Mengen an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fellen[COLOR_REVERT] gewinnen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the coast and the sea. Any tile with bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seals[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walruss[COLOR_REVERT] they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the coast and the sea. Any tile with bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seals[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walruss[COLOR_REVERT] they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Seal Hunters hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with food and to acquire the valuable furs. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus Seals will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Seal Hunters hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with food and to acquire the valuable furs. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus Seals will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Seal Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Seelöwenjäger jagen entlang der Küste und auf dem ewigen Eis um ihre Mitbürger mit Nahrung zu versorgen und um wertvolle Felle zu erbeuten. Wird ein Kolonist der Arbeit auf einer Bonusressource Seelöwen zugewiesen, so wird er automatisch Seelüwenjäger. Wird dieser Beruf einem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Seelüwenjäger[COLOR_REVERT] zugewiesen, so verdoppelt sich der Ertrag an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fellen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Seal Hunters hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with food and to acquire the valuable furs. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus Seals will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Seal Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Seal Hunters hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with food and to acquire the valuable furs. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus Seals will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Seal Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] anzubauen und große Mengen dieses Rohstoffs zu ernten. Die Produktion an Hanf eines Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] anzubauen und große Mengen dieses Rohstoffs zu ernten. Die Produktion an Hanf eines Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!
TEXT.French: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Hanf überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Rope Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Rope Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seile[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Rope Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Rope Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Rope Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Rope Makers produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.
TEXT.French: Rope Makers produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.
TEXT.German: Seilmacher produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seile[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden meist in Gebäuden der Hafengegend statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Rope Makers produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Indigo Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to creating bountiful [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT] crops. Any Indigo-producing tile they work will have its Indigo production doubled!
TEXT.French: Il n'y a pas mieux qu'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteur d'indigo professionnel[COLOR_REVERT] pour produire d'abondantes cultures d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Les Planteurs d'indigo professionnels doublent la production d'indigon dans la case qu'ils exploitent !
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Indigopflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT] anzupflanzen. Die Indigoproduktion jedes Indigo produzierenden Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatori esperti di indicado[COLOR_REVERT] sono i migliori lavoratori disponibili, quando si tratta di ottenere grandi raccolti di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]indicado[COLOR_REVERT]. Ogni casella produttrice di indicado in cui lavorano raddoppia la produzione!
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantadores de indigo expertos[COLOR_REVERT] son los mejores trabajadores disponibles cuando se trata de obtener una copiosa recolecta de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Cualquier casilla en la que trabajen y produzca indigo doblará su producción de éste.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the Indigo Planter profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Indigo Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with gold!
TEXT.French: Quand vous assignez un citoyen à l'exploitation de plaines, vous pouvez décider de lui allouer la profession de Planteur d'indigo, ce qui fournira à votre colonie une große quantité d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. En assignant un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteur d'indigo professionnel[COLOR_REVERT] à cette fonction, vos magasins regorgeront d'or !
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten dem Indigopflanzerberuf zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Indigopflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Indigo überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: Quando mandi un cittadino a lavorare caselle di pianure, puoi decidere di fargli svolgere la professione di coltivatore di indicado, che procurerà alla tua colonia un ricco raccolto di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indicado[COLOR_REVERT]. Assegnando questa professione a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di indicado[COLOR_REVERT], riempirai i tuoi magazzini di oro !
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando asignéis a un ciudadano a trabajar en una casilla de llanura, podéis hacer que adopte la profesión de Plantador de indigo, que proporcionará a vuestra colonia una buena cantidad de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Al asignar a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de indigo experto[COLOR_REVERT] este cometido, vuestras reservas rebosarán de este preciado material.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Stoffe und Indigo in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Stoffe und Indigo in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for dying cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for dying cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Haus des Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] ist das niedrigeste Level der Gebäudekette zur Herstellung von gefärbten Stoffen. Kolonisten mit dem Beruf Färber produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffen[COLOR_REVERT] durch den Gebrauch von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Der Einsatz eines [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister-Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion noch einmal drastisch.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for dying cloth. TEXT.French: Dyers dye [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Färber färben [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] mittels [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT], wodurch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] entstehen. Dieser Prozess finden meist in Gebäuden der Stoffproduktion statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Dyers dye [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Dyers dye [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxusgüter[COLOR_REVERT] aus Europa und andere Waren werden an die anderen Kolonisten verkauft. Die Verkaufsmenge hängt sehr stark von der Anzahl an reichen Bürgern der Stadt ab und wird direkt in Gold (Geld) bezahlt. Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Markt[COLOR_REVERT] ist notwendig um den Handel innerhalb einer Kolonie zu ermöglichen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxusgüter aus Europa[COLOR_REVERT] und andere Waren werden an die anderen Kolonisten verkauft. Die Verkaufsmenge hängt sehr stark von der Anzahl an reichen Bürgern der Stadt ab und wird direkt in Gold (Geld) bezahlt. Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dorfmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] ist notwendig um den Handel innerhalb einer Kolonie zu ermöglichen. Die Ausbaustufen, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Städtischer Markt[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Überregionaler Kolonialmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen die Nachfrage.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kanonen[COLOR_REVERT] werden zum Bau von Schiffen oder Artillery an Land benötigt. Mit den entsprechenden Gebäuden können Kanonen selbst produziert oder auch in Europa gekauft werden.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce Cannons. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce Cannons. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Master Canonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] as other colonists
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Master Canonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] as other colonists
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kannonenschmeide[COLOR_REVERT] stellen doppelt so viele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kanonen[COLOR_REVERT] her, wie andere Kolonisten

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful stone quarry, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutter are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile!
TEXT.French: To make the most of a bountiful stone quarry, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutter are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile!
TEXT.German: Nutzen Sie wenn möglich [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Steinbergarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT], da diese die doppelte Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stein[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugen.
TEXT.Italian: To make the most of a bountiful stone quarry, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutter are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile!
TEXT.Spanish: To make the most of a bountiful stone quarry, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutter are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile!

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the Stonecutter profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your warehouse will brim over with stone!
TEXT.French: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the Stonecutter profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your warehouse will brim over with stone!
TEXT.German: Beim Zuweisen eines Arbeiters zu einem Feld, welches Steinabbau erlaubt, kann dem Arbeiter der Beruf Steinbergarbeiter zugewiesen werden.
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the Stonecutter profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT]. TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] is produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a hills tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shepherd[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Sheep!
TEXT.French: When assigning a citizen to work a hills tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shepherd[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT]. TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Hügel-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafhirte[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafe[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Schafen überquellen!

TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: Tanners make [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Gerber gerben [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäute[COLOR_REVERT] zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederwaren[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden in Gebäuden für Pelz-und Ledewarenprodukton statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Tanners make [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Tanners make [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanners House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession Tanner produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanners House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession Tanner produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerberhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigste Ausbaustufe der Gebäudekette zum Gerben von Leder. Siedler im Beruf des Gerbers produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederware[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäuten[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion drastisch erhöht.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool Cloth[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool Cloth[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meisterweber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Wolle in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wollstoffe[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.

TEXT.French: Weavers make [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woolclothes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Weber scheidern [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wollkleidung[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wolle[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden in Gebäuden für Wollkleidungsproduktion statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Weber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Expert Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.
TEXT.French: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Exp. Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.
TEXT.German: Um ein Salzvorkommen optimal zu nutzen, sollten Sie einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Salzminenarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT] darauf arbeiten lassen. Erfahrene Salzminenarbeiter können doppelt so viel [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinsalz[COLOR_REVERT] von einem Salzvorkommen fördern, wie andere Siedler!
TEXT.Italian: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Exp. Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.
TEXT.Spanish: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Exp. Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful gold, silver or gemstone vein, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Prospector[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Prospectors are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silver[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gemstone[COLOR_REVERT] from a tile!
TEXT.French: Pour exploiter au mieux une importante veine d'or, engagez un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mineur d'or professionnel[COLOR_REVERT]. Les Mineurs d'or professionnels sont capables d'extraire deux fois plus d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Or[COLOR_REVERT] que la normale !
TEXT.German: Um eine Goldader, eine Silerader oder ein Edelsteinvorkommen optimal zu nutzen, sollten Sie einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Schürfer[COLOR_REVERT] daran arbeiten lassen. Erfahrene Schürfer[ können doppelt so viel [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silber[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Edelsteine[COLOR_REVERT] von einem Geländefeld fördern!
TEXT.Italian: Per sfruttare al massimo una ricca vena d'oro, chiama un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]minatore d'oro esperto[COLOR_REVERT]. I minatori d'oro esperti sono in grado di raddoppiare la quantità di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oro[COLOR_REVERT] ottenuta dalla casella!
TEXT.Spanish: Para sacar el mejor partido de una vena de oro, llamad a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Minero de oro experto[COLOR_REVERT]. Los Mineros de oro expertos son capaces de extraer el doble de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oro[COLOR_REVERT] de una casilla en la que haya este metal.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rock Salt[COLOR_REVERT] can be processed into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Miner[COLOR_REVERT] to this job will yield an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] can be processed into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Miner[COLOR_REVERT] to this job will yield an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinsalz[COLOR_REVERT] kann zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] weiterverarbeitet werden. Dieses erzielt beim Verkauf einen hohen Preis, sowohl in Europa, wie auch auf dem Binnenmarkt der Kolonien. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Minenarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, erhalten Sie sogar noch mehr von diesem durchaus lohnenden Gut!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] can be processed into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Miner[COLOR_REVERT] to this job will yield an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] can be processed into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Miner[COLOR_REVERT] to this job will yield an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Hills on Prairie tiles can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] if a Colonist is working as Pepperplanter on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is a specialist.
TEXT.French: Hills on Prairie-Tiles can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] if a Colonist is working as Pepperplanter on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is a specialist.
TEXT.German: Hügelfelder in der Prairie können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roten Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Pfefferpflanzerberuf zugewiesen wurde. Ihre Pfefferernte kann erheblich gesteigert werden, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Pfefferpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Hills on Prairie-Tiles can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] if a Colonist is working as Pepperplanter on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is a specialist.
TEXT.Spanish: Hills on Prairie-Tiles can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] if a Colonist is working as Pepperplanter on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is a specialist.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Red Pepper Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Redpepper[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Redpepper Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Redpepper[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Pfefferpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppeln den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT]ertrag jedes Geländefelds, auf dem sie arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Redpepper Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Redpepper[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Redpepper Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Redpepper[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviel Roten Pfeffer in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] bzw. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: Spice Traders dry [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Gewürzhändler trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roten Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzen[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Spice Traders dry [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: Spice Traders dry [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzhändlerhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigste Ausbaustufe des Gebäudes für den Handel mit Gewürzen und Salz. Siedler in den Berufen Gewürzhändler oder Salzhändler produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rotem Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion stark erhöht.

TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Grapes Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Winemakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Hills on Grassland can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grapes[COLOR_REVERT] if a cololnist in the profession Grape Picker is working on it.
TEXT.French: Hills on Grasland can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] if a cololnist in the profession Grapescollector is working on it.
TEXT.German: Hügelfelder auf Grasland können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Weintraubensammler zugewiesen wurde. TEXT.Spanish: Hills on Grasland can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] if a cololnist in the profession Grapescollector is working on it.

TEXT.English: Winemakers press [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] to Juice, which then is made to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Winemakers press [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] to Juice, which then is made to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Winzer pressen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] zu Traubensaft, aus dem dann [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT] entsteht. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.

Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

In einem Winzerhaus wird Wein aus Weintrauben hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Winzer zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.

TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cabinet Makers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Furniture Maker produce Furniture from Valuable Wood. Use Master [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbelschreinerei[COLOR_REVERT] ist die mittlere Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbeln[COLOR_REVERT]. In einer Möbelschreinerei werden aus Edelholz teure Möbel hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Möbelschreiner zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.

TEXT.English: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.
TEXT.French: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.
TEXT.German: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tavernen[COLOR_REVERT] erwirtschaften einen Profit durch den Verkauf von Alkohol. Je höher die Kulturrate der Stadt, desto effektiver sind sie. Die Ausbaustufen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Koloniales Opernhaus[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den Gewinn durch Kultur.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
TEXT.French: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen- oder Grasland-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerstebauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Bauern[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] überquellen!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Brewers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brauhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die kleinste Stufe einer Braugebäudes. Bierbrauer produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bier[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Bierbrauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Schlachtermeister[COLOR_REVERT] produzieren doppelt so viel [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wolle[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tierhäute[COLOR_REVERT] von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafen[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rindern[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.German: Gerber gerben [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäute[COLOR_REVERT] zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederwaren[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden in Gebäuden für Pelz-und Ledewarenprodukton statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Cod is the common name for the genus Gadus of demersal fishes. Cod is also used as part of the common name for a number of other fish species. The two most important species of cod are the Atlantic cod, which lives in the colder waters and deeper sea regions throughout the North Atlantic, and the Pacific cod, found in both eastern and western regions of the northern Pacific. Cod is popular as a food with a mild flavour and a dense, flaky white flesh.

Cod is popular as a food with a mild flavour and a dense, flaky white flesh.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Kabeljau ist ein gebräuchlicher name für mehrere Fischarten. Die zwei wichtigsten Spezies sind der Atlantik Kabeljau, der in den kalten und tieferen Regionen des Nordatlantiks vorkommt und der Pazifik Kabeljau, der im nördlichen Pazifik zu finden ist. Kabeljau ist euafgrund seines milden Geschmacks und seimen festen, weissen Fleisch sehr beliebt.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The development of fishing boats took place in parallel with the development of boats built for trade and war. Early navigators began to use animal skins or woven fabrics for sails. Affixed to a pole set upright in the boat, these sails gave early boats more range, allowing voyages of exploration. In the 15th century, the Dutch developed a type of sea-going herring drifter that became a blueprint for European fishing boats. During the 17th century, the British developed the dogger, an early type of sailing trawler or longliner, which commonly operated in the North Sea. The dogger takes its name from the Dutch word dogger, meaning a fishing vessel which tows a trawl. Dutch trawling boats were common in the North Sea, and the word dogger was given to the area where they often fished, which became known as the Dogger Bank. Doggers were slow but sturdy, capable of fishing in the rough conditions of the North Sea. Like the herring buss, they were wide-beamed and bluff-bowed, but considerably smaller, about 15 metres long, a maximum beam of 4.5 metres, a draught of 1.5 metres, and displacing about 13 tonnes. They could carry a tonne of bait, three tonnes of salt, half a tonne each of food and firewood for the crew, and return with six tonnes of fish. Decked areas forward and aft probably provided accommodation, storage and a cooking area. An anchor would have allowed extended periods fishing in the same spot, in waters up to 18 metres deep. The dogger would also have carried a small open boat for maintaining lines and rowing ashore.

TEXT.German: [TAB]Die Tätigkeit als Fischer ist bereits für die frühesten menschlichen Gesellschaftsformen der Wildbeuter anzunehmen. Den Beruf des Fischers gibt es oft schon in Gesellschaften mit nur geringer Arbeitsteilung. Er setzt den Besitz und die Beherrschung ganz spezieller Arbeitsmittel wie Fischerboot, Piroge oder Fischkutter sowie von Fischernetzen voraus.

TEXT.English: [TAB]A [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fishing Boat[COLOR_REVERT] on an ocean tile with a bonus resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cod[COLOR_REVERT] or other kinds ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crabs[COLOR_REVERT] can be given order to start [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing[COLOR_REVERT]. Fishing boats are the only units to which this mission is available. Every game turn, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] is harvested and put into the cargo hold. Each of these bonus resource can be harvested by only a single fishing boat at a time.

TEXT.German: [TAB]Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fischerboot[COLOR_REVERT] kann auf Ozean Felder mit der Resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kabejau[COLOR_REVERT] oder anderen Resourcen, wie [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fisch[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Krabben[COLOR_REVERT] mit dem [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fischfang[COLOR_REVERT] beginnen. Fischerboote sind die einzige Einheit denen dies möglich ist. Jede Runde wird [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fisch[COLOR_REVERT] gefangen und im Frachtraum gelagert. Auf einer Resource kann immer nur ein Fischerboot gleichzeitig mit dem Fang beschäftigt sein.
